name: Toaster's Revenge
description: A man gets murdered in his house that he has cherished for 50+ years. He doesn’t want anyone to come into his house and will do everything he can to keep people away from his house. We will murder people to protect his precious house with a toaster.  The goal of the game is to murder the people that come into the house by isolating the person stealthily, don’t alert them or they will call for backup and burn the house down.
